description: Hands-on missions for chapter 6 using arithmetic, comparison, assignment, and logical operators to build and test expressions.

solution.notes: Learner should use +, -, *, /, //, %, and ** on at least two numbers and print the results. Validator can check for correct use of each operator and at least six print statements.
Learner should use ==, !=, <, >, <=, >= to compare numbers and print the results. Validator can check for correct use of each operator and at least six print statements.
Learner should use =, +=, -=, *=, /= to update a variable and print the value after each change. Validator can check for correct use of each operator and at least five print statements.
Learner should use and, or, not with boolean expressions and print the results. Validator can check for correct use of each logical operator and at least three print statements.
